Title: Bachmanity Insanity
Writer: Carson Mell, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: Richard's new relationship is threatened by neuroses; Big Head and Erlich's launch party has snags; Dinesh falls for a foreign coworker.
